auth.passwordMin8: Password must be at least 8 characters long
auth.passwordMustContainCapital: Password must contain at least one capital letter
auth.passwordMustContainNumber: Password must contain at least one number
auth.passwordMustContainSymbol: Password must contain at least one symbol
